Contact.Commentary:
From: Titilope Oloruntosin titilope_oloruntosin@hotmail.com To: daniel_adeniji@hotmail.com Subject: Re: An emergency message strickly to Dayo Date: Wed, 14 Apr 2004 21:05:32 +0000 Goodday, Pls. Mrs Sola Adeniji is critically heal here in Lagos. She has been hospitalized for some days now. Her Dr. complains of her slim chance of survival. She may need the speedy attention of anybody that cares especially her children Uncle kehinde, Taiwo and Dayo. She had an attack precisely and now in comatose. Pls someone should come and see her b4 she finally gives up the ghost. This is an urgent and seemingly helpless situation. pls. respond. its me tity ( (Mrs sola adeniji's niece) Mummy: I went ahead and forwarded your message to Dayo. The last time he sent me an email, he used one Uncle Niyi had set up for him - oscaradedayo@hotmail.com. Sometimes next week he is planning on leaving Atlanta to return back to Charlotte. And, so I doubt that he will have easy, reliable access to a computer from Charlotte. All is well as can be expected. Please keep me in your prayers, as well. And, as much as possible check your email. Which email address do you prefer and do you suppose is more reliable? Wale called Uncle Segun over the weekened. Please urge him to reestablish email connectivity, as well. Of if your prefer, please designate an email address of a close family member or friend who regularly checks his email (and I will drop regular email updates at that email address, as well). That way we can all be in synch. Take care & God Bless.
My Dearest Dayo, Complients of the season. I wish u a fufilling & a fitting new year a new beginning. By now , u need to make a flashback on yo past life & yester years. My boy! u cannot afford to continue with such a baseless past. God has heavyly invested in u which he list wouldn't want to get wasted. Your admission into ogun poly didn't work. Remeber that ever since you convertererparts have graduated and settle down. At age 33, no education, no form of foundation at all. What do u want me to do to save your future. I Love U and U're dear to everyone in the family. People have high expectation on your life. You need a job to earn a honest living to make something out of your life and settle down. Commithing suicide is no solution. Jesus is the only one that can >make a meaning out of your life. Locate any MFM(mountain of fire & miracles) Branch around. Go for deliverance there and tell God to put the broken piecec of your life together and redeem your destiny. My boy! I must have a good testimony concerning U this year. I'm not getting younger anymore neither U make God happy and make me happy in my old age. Do me provd to shame your enemise discuss your problem with the MFM pastor of the branch U visit with all sincerent. Show sincere gratitude to all those that have ones given one thing or the other especially your Dad, Taiwo Kenny and your uncles. U survived then because they did I all they did. Read 1st chronicle verse 4, 9-10, Ephesiance 6 verse 10- 12. I expect a positive change in no time. I wish U all the best!. January 12th is my birth day. I pray the mercy and the favour(Keep fit and >really fit) of God upon your life dear. Dayo, send your e-mail address to me. Your Mum. Take good care.

Contact.Company: Central Piedmont Community College (CPCC) Charlotte North Carolina (CPCC)
Contact.Title: President
Contact.Commentary: Richard H. Hagemeyer http://www.cpcc.cc.nc.us/Library/Campuses/hagemeyer.htm Dr. Hagemeyer spent 23 years as President of Central Piedmont Community College (1963-1986). Originality is a crossword.
